coupling:general.name: Joule losses
coupling:general.coupling:description: Heat generated by Joule losses in current field

coupling:vector_form.axi_linear: - cu_gamma * (source0dr * source0dr + source0dz * source0dz) * r * vval
coupling:vector_form.axi_newton: - cu_gamma * (source0dr * source0dr + source0dz * source0dz) * r * vval

coupling:matrix_form.axi_linear: cu_gamma * (udr * udr + udz * udz) * r * vval
coupling:matrix_form.axi_newton: cu_gamma * (udr * udr + udz * udz) * r * vval

coupling:vector_form.axi_linear: - cu_gamma * (updr * updr + updz * updz) * r * vval
coupling:vector_form.axi_newton: - cu_gamma * (updr * updr + updz * updz) * r * vval

coupling:vector_form.axi_linear: - cu_gamma * (source0dr * source0dr + source0dz * source0dz) * r * vval
coupling:vector_form.axi_newton: - cu_gamma * (source0dr * source0dr + source0dz * source0dz) * r * vval

coupling:matrix_form.axi_linear: cu_gamma * (udr * udr + udz * udz) * r * vval
coupling:matrix_form.axi_newton: cu_gamma * (udr * udr + udz * udz) * r * vval

coupling:vector_form.axi_linear: - cu_gamma * (updr * updr + updz * updz) * r * vval
coupling:vector_form.axi_newton: - cu_gamma * (updr * updr + updz * updz) * r * vval
